summary: The document is a declassified message concerning the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing financial support to the President Guanabara Chemical Workers Federation for December elections. It outlines intentions to back a democratic slate, highlights the lack of consensus among democratic groups, and emphasizes a request for detailed planning to prevent discord among democrats.
key_findings: Financial support was allocated to the President Guanabara Chemical Workers Federation for the December elections.
The aim was to bolster a democratic slate, yet unity among democratic factions was not realized.
A call for detailed information was made to mitigate potential conflicts or opposition within democratic circles, underscoring the necessity for clear strategies.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
